website_summaries.verdict: Nice price point for a bingo kit that includes a cage and numbered balls for random drawings.
pros: Kit includes a small spinner cage and 75 numbered balls for calling numbers, which some players prefer over cards with numbers
Entire collection is small enough to take with you anywhere
You'll receive a board so you can mark the numbers as they're called
cons: Smaller than some other bingo kits

customer_reviews.title: Nice smaller bingo cage
customer_reviews.text: I actually purchased this bingo cage since the balls did NOT come with the letter included with the numbers. We use it for a 50-50 drawing at our club meetings to add a little bit of whimsy. This manual rotating cage replaces our vintage little battery operated lotto numbers cage that bit the dust. For the price it will meet out needs. I will probably coat the numbers with some clear nail polish as I can see where they could start to wear away otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Smith

customer_reviews.title: Small Machine but compact
customer_reviews.text: The machine is pretty small, so the balls are small, and the numbers on the ball is small. It doesn’t have the Letter on the ball so unless you know what letters the number falls under it takes a second tocall it out. The machine moves when you go to turn it so sometimes if you jerk it the balls all roll out of the spot on the board that is connected to the bottom of the wheel. But it worked for what I needed for my kids bday party. And I love that it is compact. A couple size bigger would have been perfect tho.
customer_reviews.author: Cyrus

customer_reviews.title: family fun for all ages
customer_reviews.text: I picked up this bingo set to allow my extended family to have virtual game night online when we couldn't get together in person. It works great because everyone enjoys the clatter of the bingo balls - we set up on camera phone just on the cage. The board that holds the numbers after they have been called is great, as is the fact that the set comes with a few blank balls if one goes missing. One downside- after only a few uses, some of the numbers appear to be running off a bit, but we'll use a Sharpie to resolve that situation if necessary. A great addition to family game night!
customer_reviews.author: C. Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Used for Fantasy Football draft.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a fantasy football lottery style draft. Marked each ball with a different permanent marker color based on previous years finishing position and gave each team a number of balls 1–10. Only used about 55 of the original balls. Worked perfect. Was a lot more fun than a standard draft. Worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen H Cable

customer_reviews.title: Broke on the first close
customer_reviews.text: The little handle to open and close the cage broke immediately. On the first close. I taped it shut and if you tape the right spots the balls wont stick to the tape. Sigh. Other than that it’s a good looking set. The ball catch works great and I like it. Plus the customer service is great. They reached out to me! Got a partial refund and kept the item.
customer_reviews.author: Jessi

customer_reviews.title: Number started to disappear in balls
customer_reviews.text: Numbers in the balls started scratching after one usage. Manufacturing deffect or asimole bad product?
customer_reviews.author: P. Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Fun game
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I play every couple of days. I am an avid bingo player, who used to play almost every night. Only complaint I have is the numbers are beginning to wear off/flake off the balls. This will obviously make the game unplayable.
customer_reviews.author: yankeefan7152

customer_reviews.title: Did not come as expected
customer_reviews.text: I prevously wrote explaining the problem with the bingo game and have yet to hear from anyone. The balls numbers are coming off. The ball catcher was broken as you see in the picture, the cards are perforated as they serve no good purpose. They should be solid so that we may place beans/chips on the actual numbers on the cards. I would like to know what my recourse of action. I would like to receive the ball catcher,cards and balls should anything be replaced. Than I shall be content as to the actual item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Clip broke but not a bad machine
customer_reviews.text: Worth the $16, the clip that closes the roller broke but I used taped to keep it shut. But all in all not a bad machine.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch Furber

customer_reviews.title: Had fun
customer_reviews.text: Kids loved it! Cage apparatus seems a bit shakey and bingo balls look as if the numbers will rub off soon. Otherwise we had fun.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Podlesnik

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: This product works fine. I bought this to make bingo easier for the seniors i work with and they seem to like it. Only issue I have is that the number balls tend to bounce off the ramp sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: katherine

customer_reviews.title: While playing takes a couple minutes to figure out which ...
customer_reviews.text: While playing takes a couple minutes to figure out which Letter goes to the number. since the balls only have Numbers. so you have to match it to the column on the keeper.
customer_reviews.author: Hthompson

customer_reviews.title: I recommend that the number on the balls be painted with ...
customer_reviews.text: I recommend that the number on the balls be painted with the clear/transparent nail polish; since the numbers come off easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: letters
customer_reviews.text: balls roll off fast and don't always stay on the machine, well roll on the table or floor. and there are no letter on the ball which slow down the game. player want to hear the letter and the number together.
customer_reviews.author: VELMA

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Love the fact that the number tray is actually attached to the numer cage. Good quality
customer_reviews.author: Julianna Kelly

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice inexpensive Bingo game
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice inexpensive Bingo game. My only issue with it is that I had to order chips separately to place on the cards. Do Bingo games not come fully stocked with all you need these days. And it only comes with 20 cards. If you use daubers instead of chips you are going to run out of cards really quick. Other than that it's okay.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Naquin

customer_reviews.title: Easy on the Caller's Eyes!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a friend who calls Bingo at a local senior home. He really appreciates the legible characters - black writing on white & the new cage! A keeper for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Little Fish

customer_reviews.title: Needed to order a different set-
customer_reviews.text: I’m sure the cage door would have broke off, since it’s a cheap plastic but I returned since it has number and no letters- bingo to me requires 2 things and it’s missing one
customer_reviews.author: ShellyLynn0210

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. You can bend the numbers on the cards, so you don't need chips/markers to keep track of your numbers and you can reuse them. It also comes with extra blank balls so if you lose a number (which seems to happen often with my kids) you can write it on a blank ball and keep using the set.
customer_reviews.author: Tritri

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: We love playing this Bingo game. Easy and fun, family time! Fast shipping!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply Made
customer_reviews.text: The wheel spins okay. The numbers on the black balls are already coming off after a few weeks of moderate use, which makes playing Bingo nearly impossible. Would never buy from this seller again!
customer_reviews.author: A. Nocerino

customer_reviews.title: Great product for our Covid-19 family zoom meetings
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this bingo set for our weekly family zoom meetings. The grand kids take turns as the bingo caller setting their tablet camera on the pull out board. Just a great setup , very easy to store and use. Excellent
customer_reviews.author: shannon roth

customer_reviews.title: It's awesome
customer_reviews.text: Im using this for a promotion to create fun Virtually with a game of bingo for my group to raise fun we all can use through this pandemic.
customer_reviews.author: KRISSI

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Arrived in great condition and as promised. Good value - metal cage, attached tray and lots of cards.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jo McMorran

customer_reviews.title: ... been looking for the numbers are large and I love the convenient tray that's attached
customer_reviews.text: Just what I have been looking for the numbers are large and I love the convenient tray that's attached. Thanks again!!!
customer_reviews.author: marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a friend and we enjoyed playing the game!
customer_reviews.author: MelloKello1918

customer_reviews.title: Love it but make sure to buy chips
customer_reviews.text: Love it but make sure to buy chips. The cards with it are meant to be punched on the numbers. Plus you can always purchase other cards as well. So much fun!!
customer_reviews.author: Bree

customer_reviews.title: Great machine but has cards that you fold the numbers ...
customer_reviews.text: Great machine but has cards that you fold the numbers over or tear out rather than cover with markers. Improvised with dollar store little stones
customer_reviews.author: renfrewrose

customer_reviews.title: Ordered these to use for a work casino party. ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these to use for a work casino party. Just as expected and help executing our party as planned.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied with bingo game
customer_reviews.text: I do not like the quality of the game, especially the cards. pushing the numbers through on the cards is a poor idea. one needs to use chips on the numbers so the cards and be reused. Too much plastic.I plan to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Grammy Jo

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: For what I paid its okay. The numbers are already coming off after the first time playing..
customer_reviews.author: Joann

customer_reviews.title: Functional and portable
customer_reviews.text: I like the compact nature of the product. It worker well for our needs and has extra white number balls in case one gets lost.
customer_reviews.author: T. Durham

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Although plastic and the cards are small, for the price it's a good value. 😁
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Not long lasting
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok, just nit practical to put away and I didn’t realize you have to punch out the numbers on the bingo cards which sucks, and the numbers on the balls are already wiping off
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn A

customer_reviews.title: Grandkids love it
customer_reviews.text: Bought so my Gkids could entertain their great grandma, she loves bingo. Bought the paper cards and they daub for hours.
customer_reviews.author: kellyjo

customer_reviews.title: This Bingo Cage is very sturdy and controls the Bingo numbered balls with easy
customer_reviews.text: This Bingo Cage is very sturdy and controls the Bingo numbered balls with easy. Easy to turn the cage and select a number.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: We mainly just use this to keep the numbers in ...
customer_reviews.text: We mainly just use this to keep the numbers in. It is slow and the balls usually roll off onto the floor. But it's still fun
customer_reviews.author: Joni L. Castro

customer_reviews.title: Delivery was fast and on time!!
customer_reviews.text: We love it!!! My kids and I play Bingo twice a week such a great family game. 💖💖💖
customer_reviews.author: lesa ray

customer_reviews.title: still usable brings fun to my guests
customer_reviews.text: some of the numbers are fading, still usable brings fun to my guests. okay for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Keizer166

customer_reviews.title: NO LETTERS ON BALLS!
customer_reviews.text: I wish i would of read or noticed the balls did not have the letters on them! I would have ordered a different bi go set if i would of noticed this!
customer_reviews.author: Beth D.

customer_reviews.title: Bingo
customer_reviews.text: Had a BINGO party for my Scentsy customers and this was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Erica LeVasseur

customer_reviews.title: Compact and complete
customer_reviews.text: A compact bingo set. The grandkids love it. Though it comes with a few cards, I purchased an additional pack of paper cards so that the kids can use daubers.......Twice the fun!
customer_reviews.author: Lois Gaffke

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: It's cheap, but for the price it was a good value. I only needed it to work once and it wasn't falling apart at the seams. I plan on using it a lot more often.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Guzman

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: This game is fine for kids, but it's kind of cheap. All plastic parts, balls etc. But it works.
customer_reviews.author: lisa allen

customer_reviews.title: Family game night
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for game nights and my grandchildren are having a blast. The cards are a bit difficult so we bought separate cards. The ball machine is working well.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Goldsborough

customer_reviews.title: As advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Product as advertised. Shipping was delayed, but I worked around that.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Kingsley

customer_reviews.title: The bingo cage was perfect. It was easy to set up and it ...
customer_reviews.text: The bingo cage was perfect. It was easy to set up and it worked very well. My students loved taking turns calling numbers. I would buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A. Schwab

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Very decent quality to play at home with the kids
customer_reviews.author: DianaTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Hours of family fun,!
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly what the box showed!! Hours of family fun
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Virtual bingo
customer_reviews.text: Product used for virtual bingo with family in CA during pandemic. Unhappy that balls didn’t include letter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described my family has hours of fun and everything packs away nice and neat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun Fun
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a church event. Got it very timely and it was great forboyr event. Easy to set up and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... and We used my Bingo machine to have a fun time. Thank you
customer_reviews.text: Our team at work had a team building exercise and We used my Bingo machine to have a fun time. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good quality game products good for the family great way to have fun
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: the quality of the cards not good but great product....had loads of fun playing BINGO!
customer_reviews.author: Cutie J.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Dont like it.... No letters on the balls and the numbers are fuzzy Wish I could return it
customer_reviews.author: emilia smith

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: the small plastic piece that catch the ball after spinnjng was broke,decided to keep maybe I can fix
customer_reviews.author: debra bailey

customer_reviews.title: would not recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: No the numbers on the balls started coming off upon first use. I actually need to send it back but had not had time to check on how to do that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A cost-effective, compact Bingo game for the home
customer_reviews.text: Nice, compact, cheap Bingo game -- especially for those who have limited space. Conveniently comes with some game sheets and 5 extra blank balls in case one of the Bingo balls should go missing. Just a note -- if you were planning to give this to a senior : the balls are rather small and might be hard to handle for those with arthritis. However, for the price, it's a good Bingo game for those who want to play at home with family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Cheeky Chappy

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was what I was looking for for a church play
customer_reviews.author: Jim Pruett

customer_reviews.title: Chintzy
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap and chintzy. The number balls drawn from the cage don't even have letters. The Bingo cards have tabs that are folded up when a number is called. I only hope that this will survive the one week of use it will get when my grandchildren visit for one week.
customer_reviews.author: slag dump

customer_reviews.title: No letters on balls
customer_reviews.text: I missed that there were no letters on the bingo balls. So it just said 15 rather than B15. It is usable, but strange that this detail was not mentioned.
customer_reviews.author: Robin in GA

product_meta.title: Liberty Imports Bingo Machine Cage Game Set with Balls (Classic)
product_meta.description: Add some excitement to your next party with this Classic Bingo Game Set for adults and kids. This set includes a metal bingo cage with ball tacker board, 20 reusable bingo cards, and 75 bingo balls numbered 1 - 75. Set includes everything you need for up to 20 Bingo players.Great for fundraisers, family fun and game nights. Bingo cards do not require markers or chips, simply fold the number over when called and fold back at the start of a new game. Bingo Cage measures 9" L x 8" H x 7.5" W (with Ball Tracker board closed) and 15" L x 8" H x 7.5" W (with Ball Tracker Board open).
feature_bullets: Classic Bingo set contains everything you need for Bingo!
Comes complete with metal ball spinner, just like at the bingo hall
Handy tray holds balls as they are called (no chips or markers needed)
Includes 75 balls, 20 reusable bingo cards, and bingo machine
Fun traditional game for all ages. Great to play together as a family or as a party game

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars205 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
